Texts.Chs: 在你照顾蜜蜂之前，你需要找个地方安置它们。试着先造一个^orange;小型蜂箱^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Before you take care of bees, you need a place to put them. Build an ^orange;Apiary^reset; for this.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;小型蜂箱^reset;对养蜂人而言很重要。你可能需要很多个来培养这些小家伙。
Texts.Eng: The ^orange;Apiary^reset; is essential for a beekeeper. You'll likely want more than one. You need them to breed your little buddies.
